__e: I ask my people now to remain dignified and law-abiding, whilst I seek justice for our nation, and to be returned... to my country and my wife.
I didn't feel worthy and I have no children to continue the line.
I go by many names, none of which you're worthy of pronouncing.
You're now worthy to stand with the rest of us.
I think he wishes he had another son, one worthy of taking his place.
He said that these years, they gave him a chance to become a better man, someone worthy of being my dad.
I hope that I am... and that I can be worthy of it.
I think he wishes he had another son, one worthy of taking his place.
I've got that big office because I prove myself to him year after year after year.
I suppose I do enjoy games, but I have never had a worthy opponent.
I've killed so many trying to find a worthy adversary.
If you find me a worthy opponent I'll do it for free. No charge!
Thinking you even capable of helping, for being even slightly worthy of continued existence, let alone any measure of real life.
And I pray to him to make me worthy of such a great, good man.
Sire, is that worthy of you - a man who won't even fight back?
They died with dignity, that's what good it did.
- Made his choice. In his world, that was the honorable way to die.
Ma'am, it pains me that you cannot enter your own front door in safety... and with dignity.
At last, I have found a brother-in-arms worth joining me.
I can only hope I will one day earn the right to see it.
I turned myself into something better, someone who is finally worthy to stand by you.
